neighbors.name: Kamala Hollon
neighbors.claims: Kamala Hollon is a resident of Arizona ([source](https://nationalpublicdata.com/people/h/kamala-hollon/)). She was identified as a close friend of the late Scott Joseph Rogers in a 2024 obituary ([source](https://www.dignitymemorial.com/obituaries/phoenix-az/scott-rogers-11784949)). No public statements regarding renewable energy development were found.
neighbors.influence_justification: Private citizen; no public offices found.

approach_recommendations.engage: Use a friendly, one-on-one introduction by a community liaison to share project information and invite her feedback.

citations.claim: Resident of Arizona
citations.title: Kamala Hollon - National Public Data

citations.claim: Identified as friend in Scott Rogers obituary
citations.title: Obituary for Scott Joseph Rogers

neighbors.name: Keith Ringler
neighbors.claims: Keith Ringler is a Phoenix-area resident and the brother of the late Charles Ringler ([source](https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/azcentral/name/charles-ringler-obituary?id=26641928)). He was the longtime companion of Kimberly Townsend, who passed away in 2015 ([source](https://www.dignitymemorial.com/obituaries/glendale-az/kim-townsend-ringler-6714818)). He has been listed as a donor to St. Vincent de Paul ([source](https://www.stvincentdepaul.net/sites/default/files/Fall-Winter2016_Vincentian_Spreads.pdf)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Private citizen; no public offices found.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage via personal outreach by a trusted community member, focusing on listening to his questions and addressing any concerns he may have.

neighbors.name: Salt River Project Agricultural Improvement And Power District
neighbors.claims: The Salt River Project (SRP) is an agricultural improvement district and a political subdivision of the State of Arizona ([source](https://www.srpnet.com/assets/srpnet/pdf/doing-business/SRP-Preliminary-Official-Statement-2025-Series-C.pdf)). As a major utility, SRP has committed to adding 2,025 megawatts of utility-scale solar energy to its power system by 2025 ([source](https://media.srpnet.com/srp-to-more-than-double-its-utility-scale-solar-to-2025-megawatts-by-2025/)). The organization has established sustainability goals to reduce carbon intensity by 82% by 2035 and achieve net-zero carbon emissions by 2050 ([source](https://media.srpnet.com/srp-provides-progress-report-toward-2035-sustainability-goals/)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage via corporate sustainability partnership channels to align project goals with SRP's integrated system planning.

citations.claim: Political subdivision of the State of Arizona
citations.title: SRP Preliminary Official Statement 2025 Series C

citations.claim: Committed to adding 2,025 MW of utility-scale solar by 2025
citations.title: SRP to more than double its utility-scale solar

citations.claim: Sustainability goals to reduce carbon intensity by 82% by 2035
citations.title: SRP provides progress report toward 2035 Sustainability Goals

neighbors.name: Westech Lumber LLC
neighbors.claims: Westech Lumber LLC operates a construction materials supply business at 8525 N 75th Ave in Peoria ([hub.biz](https://westech-lumber-llc.hub.biz/)). It is a subsidiary of the Younger Brothers Companies, a major regional construction and development entity ([youngerbrothers.com](https://www.youngerbrothers.com/companies/westech)). The facility serves as a lumber yard and truss plant for the parent company's operations ([youngerbrothers.com](https://www.youngerbrothers.com/about-us)). While Younger Brothers is deeply involved in residential and commercial construction, public records do not indicate a specific stance on third-party renewable energy developments, though the company is a licensed contractor ([roc.az.gov](https://roc.az.gov/sites/default/files/ROC_Posting-List_Dual_2025-08-18.csv)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Established local business and major employer in the construction sector; part of the prominent Younger Brothers group.

approach_recommendations.engage: Maintain open communication about construction schedules; emphasize potential business opportunities for construction materials supply.

neighbors.profile_summary: Westech Lumber is the materials supply arm of Younger Brothers Companies, operating a lumber yard and manufacturing facility. They are a significant local industrial stakeholder.

citations.claim: Westech Lumber LLC operates a construction materials supply business at 8525 N 75th Ave in Peoria
citations.title: Westech Lumber Profile

citations.claim: It is a subsidiary of the Younger Brothers Companies
citations.title: Younger Brothers Companies - Westech

citations.title: Younger Brothers About Us

citations.title: AZ ROC Contractor List

neighbors.name: 19 Acres LLC
neighbors.claims: 19 Acres LLC is an Arizona limited liability company holding land in the project vicinity. Public filings identify Nicolas Tran as a member/manager of the entity ([bizprofile.net](https://www.bizprofile.net/az/peoria/azul-pressure-washing-llc)). The entity appears to function as a passive landholding vehicle with no visible business operations at the site ([bizprofile.net](https://www.bizprofile.net/az/peoria/105)). No records of development applications or public stances on renewable energy were found for this entity or its principal.
neighbors.influence_justification: Passive land investor with no identified local political activity or operational footprint.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage with the registered agent/principal regarding land acquisition or partnership; highlight property value enhancement.

neighbors.profile_summary: Speculative landholding entity managed by Nicolas Tran. No active operations found.

citations.claim: Public filings identify Nicolas Tran as a member/manager of the entity
citations.title: Arizona Corporation Commission Data via BizProfile

citations.claim: The entity appears to function as a passive landholding vehicle
citations.title: Peoria Business Directory

neighbors.name: City of Peoria
neighbors.claims: The City of Peoria owns municipal land in the vicinity. The City has demonstrated a supportive stance toward renewable energy, having unanimously approved a partnership with Ameresco to install solar covered parking canopies at multiple city facilities ([peoriaaz.gov](https://www.peoriaaz.gov/Home/Components/News/News/548/)). The City operates under the 'Sustainable Peoria Plan,' which outlines goals for energy efficiency and resource conservation ([westbrookvillage.org](https://westbrookvillage.org/wp-content/uploads/2023/01/Sustainable-Peoria-Plan-20.pdf)). As a regulator, the City evaluates projects based on zoning and community benefit, but its own operational history indicates a willingness to integrate solar technology ([ameresco.com](https://www.ameresco.com/peoria-embarks-energy-efficiency-partnership-ameresco/)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Regulatory authority and landowner; has established sustainability goals.

approach_recommendations.engage: Align project proposals with the Sustainable Peoria Plan; highlight contributions to the city's renewable energy targets.

neighbors.profile_summary: Municipal entity with a documented track record of supporting and investing in solar energy for city operations.

citations.claim: having unanimously approved a partnership with Ameresco to install solar covered parking canopies
citations.title: Peoria City Council Approves Solar Project

citations.claim: The City operates under the 'Sustainable Peoria Plan,' which outlines goals for energy efficiency
citations.title: Sustainable Peoria Plan

citations.claim: operational history indicates a willingness to integrate solar technology
citations.title: Ameresco Press Release

neighbors.name: Caretaker West Peoria Parcel LLC
neighbors.claims: Caretaker West Peoria Parcel LLC is an Arizona limited liability company holding multiple parcels in the area. Public records identify Mary A. Wall as a member/manager of the entity ([bizprofile.net](https://www.bizprofile.net/az/gilbert/o-side-getaway-llc)). The entity appears to function as a real estate holding vehicle. While the name shares a keyword with 'Caretaker Landscape,' a major local firm, the registered principal (Mary A. Wall) differs from the landscape company's owner (Matt White), and no definitive operational link has been confirmed ([caretakerlandscape.com](https://www.caretakerlandscape.com/team/matt-white/)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Significant landholder in the immediate vicinity; influence stems from property rights.

approach_recommendations.engage: Contact the registered principal to discuss development plans and potential synergies.

neighbors.profile_summary: Landholding entity managed by Mary A. Wall. Likely speculative investment.

citations.claim: Public records identify Mary A. Wall as a member/manager of the entity
citations.title: Caretaker West Peoria Parcel LLC Profile

citations.claim: the landscape company's owner (Matt White)
citations.title: Caretaker Landscape Team

neighbors.name: Phi Plp 13 Llc
neighbors.claims: Phi PLP 13 LLC is a registered entity in Maricopa County linked to the VanTrust Real Estate development portfolio [Bizprofile](https://www.bizprofile.net/az/scottsdale/helping-hands-rn-services). The entity is associated with the Peoria Logistics Park (Northern & 75th Avenues), a master-planned industrial park where VanTrust Real Estate serves as the developer [Phoenix Business Journal](https://www.bizjournals.com/phoenix/news/2024/10/10/aligned-data-centers-peoria-logistics-park-deals.html). In late 2024, the park's developer sold an 80-acre tract to Aligned Data Centers for $43.2 million, marking a significant land disposition to a major industrial user [DatacenterDynamics](https://www.datacenterdynamics.com/en/news/aligned-acquires-land-in-phoenix-arizona/).
neighbors.influence_justification: As the land-holding entity for a major industrial developer (VanTrust), the entity drives significant local economic activity but functions primarily as a corporate vehicle rather than a community leader.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage VanTrust Real Estate’s local development representative to emphasize how the new project complements their industrial park plan; coordinate on infrastructure or access improvements that benefit both parties.

citations.claim: Phi PLP 13 LLC is a registered entity in Maricopa County linked to the VanTrust Real Estate development portfolio
citations.title: Phi Plp 13, LLC Company Profile - Bizprofile

citations.claim: Associated with the Peoria Logistics Park where VanTrust Real Estate serves as the developer
citations.title: Aligned Data Centers buys land in Peoria Logistics Park

citations.claim: Sold an 80-acre tract to Aligned Data Centers for $43.2 million
citations.title: Aligned acquires land in Phoenix, Arizona

neighbors.name: Trader Joes Company
neighbors.claims: Trader Joe’s Company purchased 16 acres in the Peoria Logistics Park for a 155,000 sq ft cold-storage distribution center, paying $7.1 million in cash for the site in 2024 [VanTrust Real Estate](https://vantrustrealestate.com/new-peoria-logistics-park-fills-up-with-tenants-including-two-major-food-brands/). The facility is part of Trader Joe’s regional supply network and was drawn to the location’s central valley position and build-to-suit opportunity, following the lead of Frito Lay’s nearby facility [Phoenix Business Journal](https://www.bizjournals.com/phoenix/news/2024/04/22/trader-joes-peoria-logistics-park.html). The company has demonstrated a corporate commitment to sustainability, including goals to match electricity use with renewable energy and reduce refrigerant emissions [EPA](https://www.epa.gov/enforcement/trader-joes-company-clean-air-act-settlement).
neighbors.influence_justification: High-profile national brand with local distribution investment; moderate job creator and economic contributor, but limited direct community engagement regarding local development policy.

approach_recommendations.engage: Coordinate with Trader Joe’s corporate logistics/property management team to ensure the project does not impede trucking access or facility operations; highlight any improvements (e.g., road upgrades) that could benefit their distribution efficiency.

citations.claim: Purchased 16 acres in the Peoria Logistics Park for a 155,000 sq ft cold-storage distribution center, paying $7.1 million in cash
citations.title: New Peoria Logistics Park Fills Up With Tenants

citations.claim: Drawn to the location’s central valley position and build-to-suit opportunity
citations.title: Trader Joe's buys land for distribution center in Peoria

citations.claim: Corporate commitment to sustainability and renewable energy goals
citations.title: Trader Joe's Company Clean Air Act Settlement

neighbors.name: Aligned Data Centers Peoria Prop Co Llc
neighbors.claims: Aligned Data Centers Peoria Prop Co LLC, part of Aligned Data Centers, acquired a substantial land parcel in the Peoria Logistics Park from VanTrust Real Estate for $43.2 million in late 2024 [DatacenterDynamics](https://www.datacenterdynamics.com/en/news/aligned-acquires-land-in-phoenix-arizona/). The company plans to develop a data center campus on the site, adding to its existing Phoenix and Glendale presence [Phoenix Business Journal](https://www.bizjournals.com/phoenix/news/2024/10/10/aligned-data-centers-peoria-logistics-park-deals.html). Aligned Data Centers has a stated commitment to matching 100% of its annual energy consumption with zero-carbon renewable energy and has previously partnered with local utilities on microgrid projects [Aligned Data Centers](https://aligneddc.com/blog/aligned-data-centers-achieves-2021-milestones-in-growth-sustainability-and-historic-green-financing/).
neighbors.influence_justification: Major technology infrastructure investor with a large landholding; significant capital investment and close ties to municipal infrastructure planning and utility partnerships.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage Aligned’s development executives early to align on utility infrastructure and site planning; assure them the project will not compromise (and may even enhance) critical resources like power capacity or fiber connectivity needed for their future data center operations.

citations.claim: Acquired a substantial land parcel in the Peoria Logistics Park for $43.2 million in late 2024
citations.title: Aligned acquires land in Phoenix, Arizona

citations.claim: Plans to develop a data center campus on the site, adding to its existing Phoenix and Glendale presence
citations.title: Aligned Data Centers buys land in Peoria Logistics Park

citations.claim: Commitment to matching 100% of its annual energy consumption with zero-carbon renewable energy
citations.title: Aligned Data Centers Achieves Milestones in Growth and Sustainability

neighbors.name: Westech Lumber Llc
neighbors.claims: Westech Lumber LLC is a lumber and hardware retailer located at 8525 N 75th Ave in Peoria, serving professional contractors and DIY customers [MapQuest](https://www.mapquest.com/us/arizona/westech-lumber-459493132). The business is owned by Younger Brothers Companies, a major Arizona construction services firm [Younger Brothers](https://www.youngerbrothers.com/companies/westech). Younger Brothers Companies has publicized a 'Clean Energy Plan' and promotes itself as 'Green Friendly,' utilizing sustainable forest products and solar energy at its facilities [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7P-m7cAyGjg).
neighbors.influence_justification: Small independent business unit of a larger regional company; well-regarded locally for trade supply but limited political clout compared to major developers.

approach_recommendations.engage: Meet with the manager of Westech Lumber to address any concerns (e.g., road closures) and highlight that the development could drive more building projects; reference the parent company's sustainability goals to build rapport.

neighbors.name: Ci351 Peoria Logistics LLC / Douglas Peoria Logistics LLC
neighbors.claims: Ci351 Peoria Logistics LLC and Douglas Peoria Logistics LLC are entities associated with the Peoria Logistics Park development at Northern & 75th Avenues ([Bizprofile](https://www.bizprofile.net/ca/los-angeles/jib-yuma-llc-2)) ([Bizprofile](https://www.bizprofile.net/ca/manhattan-beach/zevo-partners-llc)). The site is part of a 150-acre industrial infill project developed by VanTrust Real Estate, which broke ground in 2022 ([Peoria AZ](https://www.peoriaaz.gov/Home/Components/News/News/4449/)). The land was historically used for agriculture (Rovey family dairy) before being rezoned and sold for the Legacy Point master plan ([Peoria AZ](https://www.peoriaaz.gov/Home/Components/News/News/4449/)). While VanTrust is the master developer, these specific LLCs appear in business directories linked to the logistics park context, though their specific management structure is not detailed in available public records ([Bizprofile](https://www.bizprofile.net/ca/los-angeles/jib-yuma-llc-2)). The entities appear to function as special purpose vehicles for land holding or investment within the broader industrial park project.
neighbors.influence_justification: Associated with a major industrial development project (Peoria Logistics Park); influence stems from significant real estate investment rather than direct community leadership.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage through the master developer (VanTrust Real Estate) or project leads for Peoria Logistics Park. The entities likely represent investment interests aligned with the industrial build-out.

neighbors.profile_summary: Investment entities linked to the 150-acre Peoria Logistics Park development.

citations.claim: Ci351 Peoria Logistics LLC and Douglas Peoria Logistics LLC are entities associated with the Peoria Logistics Park development
citations.title: Ci351 Peoria Logistics LLC Company Profile

neighbors.name: F&J Ruiz Holdings LLC
neighbors.claims: F&J Ruiz Holdings LLC is an Arizona limited liability company associated with land ownership in the Northern Ave/75th Ave vicinity. The entity was among the landowners in the area assembled for the Legacy Point/Peoria Logistics Park project ([Commercial Search](https://www.commercialsearch.com/news/vantrust-breaks-ground-on-phoenix-area-logistics-project/)). VanTrust Real Estate acquired approximately 108 acres in this area in late 2023 for the industrial park development, a transaction involving a significant multi-million dollar sum ([VanTrust Real Estate](https://vantrustrealestate.com/new-peoria-logistics-park-fills-up-with-tenants-including-two-major-food-brands/)). The LLC appears to function as a real estate holding vehicle, with no other active business operations publicly listed beyond this land investment activity.
neighbors.influence_justification: Private investment entity with no documented public community leadership role; influence limited to historical land ownership.

approach_recommendations.engage: If the entity retains any remnant parcels, approach with financial offers aligned with the area's industrial transition. The primary motivation appears to be investment return.

neighbors.profile_summary: Land holding entity that sold property for the Peoria Logistics Park development.

citations.claim: VanTrust Real Estate acquired approximately 108 acres in this area in late 2023
citations.title: New Peoria Logistics Park Fills Up With Tenants

citations.claim: Peoria Logistics Park development at Northern and 75th Avenues
citations.title: VanTrust Breaks Ground on Phoenix-Area Logistics Project

neighbors.name: Sharro LLC
neighbors.claims: Sharro LLC is an Arizona limited liability company that owns industrial property in Peoria, specifically the parcels at 7773 W Seldon Ln and 7634 W Carol Ave ([Xome](https://www.xome.com/realestate/7773-w-seldon-ln-peoria-az-85345-4540990)) ([Xome](https://www.xome.com/realestate/7634-w-carol-ave-peoria-az-85345-4540894)). The property at 7773 W Seldon Ln is a light industrial site (machine shop/office) acquired by Sharro LLC in 2020 ([Xome](https://www.xome.com/realestate/7773-w-seldon-ln-peoria-az-85345-4540990)). Public records indicate the site is associated with Cascade Drilling, an environmental and geotechnical drilling service provider, suggesting Sharro LLC may act as the property holding company or landlord ([Kompass](https://us.kompass.com/c/cascade-drilling-l-p/usm07768300/)). The entity was incorporated in 2015 with a principal address in Phoenix ([Bizprofile](https://www.bizprofile.net/az/phoenix/sharro-llc)). There are no public records of Sharro LLC engaging in local political or planning discussions, implying a neutral stance focused on industrial property operations.
neighbors.influence_justification: Industrial property owner with no significant public profile or documented community leadership.

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach as a standard industrial neighbor. Address potential impacts on access or operations at the Seldon Ln facility. The owner appears to be a real estate holding entity for industrial operations.

neighbors.profile_summary: Industrial property owner (holding company) for sites on W Seldon Ln and W Carol Ave.

neighbors.name: Transwestern Pipeline Company LLC
neighbors.claims: Transwestern Pipeline Company, LLC owns and operates a major interstate natural gas pipeline system that transports gas from Texas and the Four Corners area to California ([Energy Transfer](https://twtransfer.energytransfer.com/)). The company is a subsidiary of Energy Transfer Partners ([Energy Transfer](https://twtransfer.energytransfer.com/)). Transwestern maintains the "Phoenix Lateral" pipeline segment which runs through Maricopa County, delivering natural gas to the Phoenix area ([Pipeline Safety Info](https://www.pipelinesafetyinfo.com/user/file/Arizona/Transwestern%20Pipeline%20Company.pdf)). As a regulated utility infrastructure owner, Transwestern’s primary concern is protecting its pipeline easement and ensuring development adheres to safety setbacks; the company typically does not engage in local development debates beyond enforcing safety requirements ([Pipeline Safety Info](https://www.pipelinesafetyinfo.com/user/file/Arizona/Transwestern%20Pipeline%20Company.pdf)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Controls critical energy infrastructure and has federal/state regulatory backing for easement enforcement, though lacks direct local political participation.

approach_recommendations.engage: Coordinate early with Transwestern’s right-of-way department regarding any crossings or setbacks. Strict adherence to safety regulations will likely secure their non-objection.

neighbors.profile_summary: Major interstate pipeline operator with critical infrastructure easements in the area.

citations.claim: Transwestern Pipeline Company owns and operates a major interstate natural gas pipeline system
citations.title: Transwestern Pipeline Company Informational Postings

citations.claim: Maintains the Phoenix Lateral pipeline segment in Maricopa County
citations.title: Transwestern Pipeline Company Safety Brochure

neighbors.name: DCMS Properties LLC
neighbors.claims: DCMS Properties LLC is an Arizona limited liability company recorded as the owner of Maricopa County parcel 142-20-110 (8710 N 77th Dr) ([Elementix](https://elementix.ai/investors/az/jesse-dehorty)). Public records identify Jesse Dehorty as a principal associated with the entity ([Elementix](https://elementix.ai/investors/az/jesse-dehorty)). Jesse Dehorty is the owner of Dehorty Contracting & Management Services LLC, a licensed general contractor in Arizona with a business address at the adjacent property, 8715 N 78th Ave ([The Blue Book](https://www.thebluebook.com/iProView/879357/dehorty-contracting-mgmt-services/general-contractors/locations-contacts/)). The LLC appears to serve as a landholding vehicle for business or investment assets related to Dehorty's construction operations ([The Blue Book](https://www.thebluebook.com/iProView/879357/dehorty-contracting-mgmt-services/general-contractors/locations-contacts/)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Principal Jesse Dehorty owns Dehorty Contracting, an established local construction business.

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage Jesse Dehorty directly via his contracting business. As a construction professional, he may be receptive to discussions about land value and development potential.

neighbors.name: Num 1 Job LLC
neighbors.claims: Num 1 Job LLC is listed in Maricopa County records as the owner of a property at 9819 W Butler Dr (Parcel 143-21-009A) ([Homes.com](https://www.homes.com/property/9819-w-butler-dr-peoria-az/gxt8ghd2wc3km/)). Contrary to the draft, the LLC's formation documents list a member address at 12320 N 71st Dr, Peoria, AZ ([AZCC](https://ecorp.azcc.gov/CommonHelper/GetFilingDocuments?barcode=03150121)). This address is a residential property, suggesting the LLC serves as a private landholding vehicle ([AZCC](https://ecorp.azcc.gov/CommonHelper/GetFilingDocuments?barcode=03150121)). No other active business operations or public stances on development were found for this entity ([AZCC](https://ecorp.azcc.gov/CommonHelper/GetFilingDocuments?barcode=02865348)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Private LLC with a residential member address; no evidence of broader community influence.

approach_recommendations.engage: Reach out via the member address at 12320 N 71st Dr, Peoria, AZ. Frame outreach around the financial upside of the land asset.
